      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SubTexture Animation.getCurrentFrame()
      Useful if you want to render the frames in a special way.

      Returns The texture corresponding to the texnum.

      Returns The textures.

      Returns A sprite-sheet based off of Texture baseTexture, with SubTextures subTextures.
